markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Expert Skysage Divination](/Feats.aspx?ID=4071) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 82</row>

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Skysage Divination](/Feats.aspx?ID=4065)

</column>

---

Your studies of the stars have taught you about the mysteries of the cosmos. You learn a 4th-level spell from any spell list. At 12th level, you learn a 5th-level spell, and at 14th level, you learn a 6th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from the [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) school. You become an expert with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.

<title level="2">Expert Skysage Divination leads to...</title>
[Master Skysage Divination](/Feats.aspx?ID=4075)
name: Expert Skysage Divination
